GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: A PHASE IIB, DOUBLE-BLIND, MULTI-CENTER, PLACEBO CONTROLLED, PARALLEL GROUP TRIAL OF ANALGEZIA HCL FOR THE TREATMENT OF CHRONIC PAIN

ItemGroupDef.Name: AE
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Adverse Events
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: Events - One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: DM
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: Special Purpose - One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: EX
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per constant dosing interval per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: LB
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Laboratory Tests
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: Findings - One record per lab test per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: SUPPDM

ItemGroupDef.Name: TA
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Trial Arms
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per planned Element per Arm

ItemGroupDef.Name: TS
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Trial Summary
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per trial summary parameter value

ItemGroupDef.Name: TV
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Trial Visits
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per planned Visit per Arm

ItemGroupDef.Name: XP
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Pain Scores
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per subject per visit
